fields.description:
{html}

exists in 1.6.1 as well. al;l supported ios devices. May well be tets case issue

1.Phone > camera custom overlay
2.take a pic and check output (intermittant)

fields.summary: iOS: camera custom overlay invokes exception on second press and distorts the image

comments.body: This version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
